### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE DemandForecastingData (
  product_id INT,
  forecast_date DATE,
  forecasted_demand INT,
  production_schedule_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (product_id, forecast_date)
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE DemandForecastingData SET forecasted_demand = 100 WHERE product_id = 1 AND forecast_date = '2023-01-01';
